import { useState } from "react" const defautFormfield = { displayName:'', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '' } const SignUpForm = () => { const [formFields,setFormField]=useState(defautFormfield) const {displayName, email, password, confirmPassword} = formFields const handleChange = (event) => { const [name,value] = event.target setFormField({...formFields, [name]:value}) } return (

Sign Up with your email and password

) } export default SignUpForm
